summary: Thoth was an important god in ancient Egypt, often shown with an ibis or baboon head. He represented the moon, wisdom, and writing. Thoth's main temple, in the city of Hermopolis, was once grand but is now mostly gone. He played a key role in Egyptian myths, helping to keep the universe in order. Thoth was also linked to magic, writing, and judging the dead in later Egyptian history.
title: Thoth
